Norma OrcÃ­ brings formidable strategic insight and infectious enthusiasm to OrcÃ­ clients. Always the innovator, Norma created our Share of Heartâ„¢ approach and developed our Social Consumer Network Marketing model, which is activating the Latino network on behalf of our clients. Norma serves as a strategic resource for all client teams and leads the agency’s community involvement.

Norma has taught for the UCLA Extension Program, the Advertising Educational Foundation’s (AEF) Ambassador Program and the National Hispanic Corporate Council (NHCC) Institute. She has served on the boards of the Mexican American Legal Defense Fund (MALDEF), New America Alliance (NAA), Promerica Bank, the Los Angeles Academy of Arts and Enterprise (a charter school she co-founded), and other organizations that benefit the Latino Community.
